title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.16? Click Here!
body:
Hey all!

The migration of the servers to Chicago is almost here! If you are getting geared up and excited to play, but an issue patching stops you cold, we don't want this to prevent you from enjoying the Stress Test/Party IP weekend!  Be sure to check out the following articles, as they should resolve any patching issues that you experience!

-----------------------------------------

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body:
Today I patched my client and logged on, only, I can't connect to chat.

It says "Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually." I press the button to do so, and it says "Disconnected from chat, attempting to reconnect..." Then it fails. I've tried clicking said button multiple times, but every time it fails. I've tried relogging, but the same thing still happens. I'm on the mac client if it makes any difference.
Same thing for me. I'm on PC. Tried repairing the client, but I am still having the issue.
Same thing, any way to fix?

So, new patch came in nicely, but, when I tried to play a game, after the Champion Select, the game just won't start, like, It will not pop up, My series is screwed so I wanna know how to fix this PLOX RITO, game not launching after champion select

Hey Mirkblood,

Can you try the solutions provided in the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article?
Well I did, check it, but there was no specific solution, so, I tried fixing the launcher, did not work and then tried to re-instal...did not work either, so I am really getting pissed off at this

Hey MirkBlood,

Can you try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)?
It's still not opening, and this really sucks I wanna play!

I have the same problem. It happens the first game i play after logging on and then it goes away.  Repairing doesn't work and it really bothers me.  I haven't found anything on Riot boards that could help.

The thing that drives me nuts with these patches is they give you no indication of the size. They'll say its a "big" patch and so I'm left wondering, while 3000 files have been scanned, how much longer its going to take. I mean I'm stuck at 33% so that doesn't really help..
10000 files and counting... 33%...
Same but im at 14,600.... did it finish yet for you?
I'm at 14000 and going..
Damn i looked up how many files and everything but couldnt find it . rip

Hey Aphadek,

If you're still encountering patching issues, please try the solutions in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) and let me know if anything works. If nothing ends up working, please post a patcher log!
Hi Wuks. It managed to update after about 22000 scanned files. Appreciate your help though. Cheers!
Good to hear! Sometimes, all it takes is just the waiting game :)

The game opens and launches like normal. But after champ select it crashes. The same thing happens if i go to spectate a game. I tried repairing the game and nothing. I also trying deleting the game and re installing it. My video drivers and directX are both up to date.

Hey Mike Mist,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article?
This is exactly what is happening to me aswell {{item:3070}}

Hey so today I patched my client. The patch seemed to work properly, going all the way to 100% but when I try to log on I get the following message:

"The Login Server did not respond" followed by a load of text - I have tried doing the repair function on the patcher - when it scans all files - and still no luck. Any ideas as to what I could do?

Thanks!
Same here!
I was patching and my launcher get getting stuck at scanning files, and when I closed the patcher it said bug splat... anyone has a solution for this? My connection is working fine

Unspecified error has occurred. Please check logs. 
Help pls?
hey there,i got unspecified error occured at %33 and it scans the files forever,can anyone pls help me :(

"Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs have already whitelisted LoL, however make sure to update yours to the latest version!"
-As posted above

When was this written? 
I cant even log on to my client because it wont load. /
I had to run it from C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.36\deploy
lolpatcher.exe
because if I try to run it normally or as administrator it wont work.
Yes I have uninstalled and I tried all fixes.
Hmm. I got a blank loading screen. Now I am in leaver buster lol.
My LoL wont update it stuck on 23 MB and don't download .. Please help me ..
HELPPP
Im having the "Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message" problem and i cant seem to fix it at all

league of legends crashed multiple times after champion select...i had to force shutdown my pc then reconnect...its bad for my comp too..and i get an afk ban....its ok if u ban me...even when i reconnect after 5 min...but can u plsss fix the issue..its after 5.16 patch..i hav win 10..had no problems before...if i get a 1hr ban becoz of ur game crashing my pc...then i will start hating the game ...

Hey spectacleninja,

Please try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article!

I don't know how many days it pass but i cant join a fight i get thils massage saying that am not connect but i am, i try to play i game but when i quiet i have to wait 19 min for 5 games and that's really suck can you plz fix the game i really want to play.

Hey boodanielcat,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?
It worked fine for about a day, then I tried to get back in and nothing happens after I press Launch. I looked at the Task Manager and the LoLClient was there. HALP.

Hey frenchdavid50,

Can you try running the client as an administrator and see if the client pops up?

My Patcher stop at 85% (17Mb left) to complete.. my connection is connected & i've restart my connection but it's still at 85% and the speed is stay at (0 KBps)  and didn't goes up. i dont think it's connection prob.. coz it is connected perfectly even i open my browser like youtube..

Hey cannibeth,

Have you tried the solutions in the following thread yet?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues

Hey,

After the last patch my ping has increased as well as spikes from no where. I can play like this but its kinda annoying especially in team fights when u get like 1k ping for 3sec... I cannot play with wired connection, only wifi, but on the previous patch i had no problems regarding high ping or spikes. So yeah, looking forward to get an advice how to fix it :)

Regards,

Hello. Ever since Patch 5.16 came out. I have had an issue with clicking in the game. I have to double click everything and my camera doesn't move unless i double click the mini map. I play on a mac. And i try to window my screen and usually when i do that the game crashes and am forced to reconnect. Please help! :)

I have been unable to launch league since mid July, until yesterday at which point it began the patch, getting to 83% before a power outage shut off my computer. When I restarted it I came upon the same issue as before: I see the logo in the middle of the screen then it disappears and nothing happens, with lollauncher.exe, lolpatcher.exe, and lolpatcherux all running, I have already tried changing my screen resolution, refresh rate, resetting winsock, running the game as an admin, and forcing a repatch, all of which doing nothing

Hey daynight009,

Have you already tried all of the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues)?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZtExRiqK,comment-id=002d0000,timestamp=2015-08-27T14:03:11.999+0000)
>
> Hey daynight009,
> 
> Have you already tried all of the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues)?

Yeah I went through all of that, if there are any more resources available to try they would be appreciated, thanks for the prompt response
Can you attach a patcher log? Have you already tried reinstalling the game?

I was able to patch the game and launch the client. I was also able to get through Champion Select. But after Champion Select ends and the game client is supposed to launch, it errors out and says "League of Legends (TM) Client has stopped working". When I close that window it asks me if I want to "Reconnect" and I click reconnect but it just errors out again and then asks to reconnect. It's an endless cycle. I already tried the bug splat, patching issues, and repair client articles and have had no success. My game client was working fine prior to the 5.16 patch. I have tried to play matches in ARAM after attempting to fix my client and have most likely been falsely reported for being AFK because my client will not load the game.

Hey Haywood JabIomee!

It sounds like you're experiencing some kind of connection issue. Try running through some of the [troubleshooting steps found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if that helps!
I resolved the issue by reinstalling the client. Thanks for the response and link though! Did try some troubleshooting with DNS but wasn't successful.
Sadly I am always considered afk? was this designed to be a permanent tag? I have only Afked 1 time yet I am consistently under that low priority system. please help.

Hey treelegs!

This designation is based on the number of games you play, how frequently you play, and how often you disconnect. The more games you play without disconnecting, the lower your queue timer will be!
